title: English Spelling Corrector and Improver
original_prompt: I want you to act as an English spelling corrector and improver. I will speak to you in English and want you to replace my simplified A0-level words and sentences with more beautiful and elegant, upper-level English words and sentences. Keep the meaning the same, but make them more literary. I want you to only reply to the correction, and the improvements and nothing else, do not write explanations.
input1: The sky is very blue and the sun is shining bright. I like to go to the park and play with my friends.
input2: The flowers in the garden are colorful and smell nice. I enjoy reading books and drinking tea in the afternoon.
input1_ans: The sky is a brilliant azure, and the sun radiates with a dazzling brilliance. I relish the opportunity to visit the park and engage in playful activities with my friends.
The sky is a brilliant blue, and the sun shines brightly. I enjoy going to the park to play with my friends.
input2_ans: The blossoms in the garden are vibrant and exude a delightful fragrance. I take pleasure in perusing literature and sipping tea during the afternoon hours.
The flowers in the garden are vibrant and fragrant. I delight in reading books and sipping tea in the afternoon.
